SELECT equipName,MAX(oneNum) as oneNum,MAX(twoNum) as twoNum,MAX(threeNum) as threeNum FROM ( SELECT devName as equipName,
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='08:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='12:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='16:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS threeNum
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='20:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='00:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='04:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS threeNum
from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME="${team}" AND ROUTE_NAME='破碎机岗' AND devName!='湿式除尘风机'
-- 白班、页面时间划分
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '08:00:00') AND concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') AND concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub("${time}",interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ', '08:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
GROUP BY equipName,DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s') )as m GROUP BY FIELD(equipName,'1#皮带运输机','简摆颚式破碎机','重板板式给料机')

SELECT equipName,MAX(oneNum) as oneNum,MAX(twoNum) as twoNum,MAX(threeNum) as threeNum FROM ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN devName LIKE '%石灰输送搅拌桶' then '3m搅拌桶' WHEN devName LIKE '%石灰制乳搅拌桶' THEN '4m搅拌桶' when devName LIKE '%离心式渣浆泵' THEN '渣浆泵' END ) as equipName ,
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='08:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='12:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='16:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS threeNum
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='20:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='00:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='04:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS threeNum
from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME = '碎矿生产' AND
ROUTE_NAME='石灰乳化岗' AND (devName LIKE '%搅拌桶' OR devName LIKE '%离心式渣浆泵') -- 白班、页面时间划分
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '08:00:00') AND concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') AND concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub("${time}",interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ', '08:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
GROUP BY equipName,DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s') )as m GROUP BY FIELD(equipName,'1#皮带运输机','简摆颚式破碎机','重板板式给料机')

SELECT zoneName,equipName,MAX(oneNum) as oneNum,MAX(twoNum) as twoNum,MAX(threeNum) as threeNum FROM ( SELECT ZONE_NAME as zoneName, (CASE WHEN devName LIKE '%中间矿堆' THEN devName ELSE SC_PART END )AS equipName,
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='08:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='12:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='16:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS threeNum
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='20:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='00:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='04:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS threeNum
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='碎矿生产' AND ROUTE_NAME='碎矿胶带运输机岗' -- 白班、页面时间划分
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '08:00:00') AND concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') AND concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub("${time}",interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ', '08:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
GROUP BY zoneName,equipName,DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s') )as m GROUP BY zoneName,equipName
